name: Shoepeg Corn Casserole
author: DIVER3DOWN
summary: A co-worker brought this casserole to one of our potlucks.  After I got the recipe, I made it for one of my family's Thanksgiving dinners and it has been requested so often that it has become a staple at family gatherings.
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped green bell pepper
½ cup shredded mild Cheddar cheese
1 (14.5 ounce) can French cut green beans, drained
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup
¼ (16 ounce) package buttery round crackers, crushed
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl, combine onion, celery, green pepper, cheese, corn, green beans, soup and sour cream
Combine crushed crackers with melted butter and sprinkle on top of vegetables
Bake in preheated oven for 45 minutes
